name: live-video-streamer
description: Ultra low-latency live video streaming over CDN
author: Spectral Compute

scripts.bundle: (cd server && yarn bundle) && (cd client && yarn bundle) && (cd demo-client && yarn bundle)
scripts.bundle-dev: (cd server && yarn bundle-dev) && (cd client && yarn bundle-dev) && (cd demo-client && yarn bundle-dev)
scripts.clean: rm -rf docs/dist && yarn foreach clean && rm -rf node_modules .yarn */node_modules
scripts.foreach: (cd common && yarn "$@") && (cd client && yarn "$@") && (cd demo-client && yarn "$@") && (cd server && yarn "$@")
scripts.test: (cd common && yarn test) && (cd server && yarn test) && (cd client && yarn test)
